vocabinfos.mediumDef:
1) to turn
1a) (Qal)
1a1) to turn toward or from or away
1a2) to turn and do
1a3) to turn, decline (of day)
1a4) to turn toward, approach (of evening)
1a5) to turn and look, look, look back or at or after or for
1b) (Piel) to turn away, put out of the way, make clear, clear away
1c) (Hiphil)
1c1) to turn
1c2) to make a turn, show signs of turning, turn back
1d) (Hophal) to be turned back
§ 1) to turn
1a) (Qal)
1a1) to turn toward or from or away
1a2) to turn and do
1a3) to turn, decline (of day)
1a4) to turn toward, approach (of evening)
1a5) to turn and look, look, look back or at or after or for
1b) (Piel) to turn away, put out of the way, make clear, clear away
1c) (Hiphil)
1c1) to turn
1c2) to make a turn, show signs of turning, turn back
1d) (Hophal) to be turned back
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) qal   tornar, volver; (b) pi.   despedir, aclarar; (c) hif.   volver, dar vuelta; (d) hof.   volverse, darse vuelta; (e)   volver, dar vuelta
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 轉
1a) (Qal)
1a1)轉向, 轉來, 轉離
1a2)轉做
1a3)太陽西沈
1a4) 將近, 接近 (傍晚)
1a5) 轉視, 瞧, 回頭看, 注視, 照顧, 期望
1b) (Piel) 趕走, 解散, 清出一條路（#瑪 3:1|）
1c) (Hiphil)
1c1) 轉
1c2) 轉動, 轉動的痕跡, 拒絕
1d) (Hophal)被趕走
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) 转
1a) (Qal)
1a1)转向, 转来, 转离
1a2)转做
1a3)太阳西沈
1a4) 将近, 接近 (傍晚)
1a5) 转视, 瞧, 回头看, 注视, 照顾, 期望
1b) (Piel) 赶走, 解散, 清出一条路（#玛 3:1|）
1c) (Hiphil)
1c1) 转
1c2) 转动, 转动的痕迹, 拒绝
1d) (Hophal)被赶走

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Another spelling of pin.nah (פִּנָּה "Corner( Gate)" H6438)
§ This name is used for:
1) to turn
1a) (Qal)
1a1) to turn toward or from or away
1a2) to turn and do
1a3) to turn, decline (of day)
1a4) to turn toward, approach (of evening)
1a5) to turn and look, look, look back or at or after or for
1b) (Piel) to turn away, put out of the way, make clear, clear away
1c) (Hiphil)
1c1) to turn
1c2) to make a turn, show signs of turning, turn back
1d) (Hophal) to be turned back
